translations: n.（书、电影、戏剧等的）续篇，续集；后果，结局

sentences.sentence: She is currently writing a sequel to Daphne du Maurier's "Rebecca."
sentences.translation: 她目前正在写达夫妮·杜穆里埃的《蝴蝶梦》续集。

sentences.sentence: The creators of the original X-Men abbreviated the title of its sequel to simply X2.
sentences.translation: 第1部《X战警》的创作者们把其续集的片名缩写成简单的《X2》。

sentences.sentence: The sequel will finally unveil the family secret of why Po's father is a duck.
sentences.translation: 续集将最终揭开为什么阿宝的父亲是只鸭子的家庭秘密。
